display_long_description:
Escape from Hadrian’s Wall, where history and destiny collide!
402 A. D. Britannia, the waning years of the Roman Empire. Delve into the depths in this VR puzzle adventure as a nameless prisoner held in the fortress of Hadrian’s Wall. A chance encounter offers salvation and peril alike as you come to the aid of a mother and her infant son, whose fates are entwined with destiny.

Take on the mantle of witch’s apprentice, guided by your mystical mentor.

[media]

Exercise your intellect and wield magical artifacts to solve intricate puzzles.

[media]

Cast magical cards to dispel elemental golems.

[media]

Navigate the labyrinthine fortress beneath the wall, uncovering ancient secrets best left undisturbed.

[media]

The time of destiny has come. It sits on a razor’s edge. Now, you wield the blade.

Play the demo: https://bit.ly/EfHW_QuestDemo
